attributes.action: sign up to the European Union kidnap alert plan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The EU Kidnap Alert plan is a system currently running in several European countries, notably France, Belgium, Holland and Luxembourg.  In France, the Ministry of Justice operate the "Alerte Enlèvement", an emergency message which interrupts TV, Radio, and gets posted on everything from message boards at Railway stations, to electronic Motorway warning signs.

This system is currently being looked at for extension into Portugal, and the UK could certainly use a system like this.

For the sake of everyone's children, we need this.
